Job Title: Sr. RF Principal Engineer Manager

Location: Austin, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Job Type

Full-time

Description

Company Overview:

X-Microwave provides modular RF and microwave building blocks that allow designers to

seamlessly design, evaluate, prototype, and produce high performance RF and microwave

systems faster, easier, and at lower cost.

Our Culture

Dream Big. Have Fun. Get Stuff Done. These are the three pillars that make the core of Quantic

Electronics culture. What does that really mean? Dream big feeling empowered to think

creatively with no limits, push boundaries and take risks that will positively impact the future of

our company. Have fun while you work in an informal, no ego, people first organization filled

with passionate, innovative, and committed individuals. Get stuff done in an environment

where words like empowerment, accountability, collaboration, and transparency really do exist.

Go to work each day with a sense of purpose, helping define and deliver the future of mission critical electronics.

Position Function

Quantic X-Microwave is seeking an experienced and motivated Senior Radio Frequency (RF)

Principal Engineer to join our team to support design and development of complex radar,

electronic warfare (EW) and airborne RF microwave assemblies and subsystems. Quantic X-Microwave is experiencing substantial growth at our facility in Austin, Texas and we are seeking skilled talent to join our Engineering and Manufacturing team. The traditional way of designing and manufacturing complex RF products is not cost effective and time consuming with several design iterations required to meet our customers product specifications and performance. Our X-Microwave RF building blocks and integration schemes are disruptive and game changing when it comes to designing and developing complex RF microwave products.

Responsibilities will include but are not limited to: Design, develop, assemble, integrate, and test complex RF assemblies and subsystems. Perform component analysis, trade studies, simulations, modeling, to ensure compliance with our customers product specifications. Collaboration with Quantic X-Microwaves' Technical Leads to ensure technical, cost, and schedule performance is achieved. Support technical and cost proposal preparation for future programs. Collaborate across the technical and functional organizations within Quantic Electronics.

Requirements

 Minimum of 10 years relevant experience in the defense and aerospace industry with

expertise in the designing, developing, assembly, test, and integration of complex

RF/Microwave assemblies for radar, shipborne and airborne EW applications.

 Perform trade studies, feasibility analysis, design to meet environmental, mechanical,

and electric specifications.

 Experience with low and high-power amplifier combining architectures, conversion, Tx

Rx,

 Experience cascade analysis, modeling, simulation with ADS and Altium (or similar) Strong interpersonal skills with ability to build effective working relationships in team

environment.

 Strong written and oral communication skills, able to effectively communicate to senior

leadership, customers, and academic institutions.

 Strong work ethic and self-motivation, sufficient RF hardware design experience Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills Recognized as the prime technical contact (e.g., SME) on projects and has demonstrated

direct customer engagement experience, especially in roles as a technical advisor to

management and customers.

 Familiarity with open architectures (e.g., Modular Open System Architecture) Applicants must be authorized to work for ANY employer in the U.S. We are unable to sponsor or take over sponsorship of an employment Visa.

Benefits

Competitive compensation Best in class benefits that start day 1 Matching 401k Bonus opportunity All our employees are shareholders in the companyPandoLogic. Keywords: Architectural Designer, Location: AUSTIN, TX - 78703

Experience Level (if available): None
